projects.title: NHL Positivity Index
projects.name: Using NLP and sentiment analysis to quantify the sentiment of NHL fanbases.
projects.desc: This project aims to quantitatively assess how positive or negative an NHL fanbase feels over a given period using natural language processing and sentiment analysis to analyze fan discussions on Reddit.

projects.title: AI Due Diligence Investment Analysis
projects.name: UAIS x University of Alberta Innovation Fund (UA Fund)
projects.desc: Partnering with the UA Innovation Fund, members gain real-world experience by conducting AI due diligence on startups, evaluating their technical and business viability for investment.

projects.title: RAG-Based Chatbot for Lecture Notes
projects.name: Beginner-friendly project on Retrieval-Augmented Generation.
projects.desc: Build a personal AI study assistant. This chatbot processes uploaded lecture notes (PDFs) and uses a Large Language Model to answer questions, generate summaries, and provide explanations.

projects.title: PalmPilot 2.0: Gesture Controlled Laptop Automation
projects.name: Intermediate project focused on computer vision and automation.
projects.desc: Control your laptop using hand gestures! This project uses a webcam and computer vision to map real-time gestures to system commands like adjusting volume, switching tabs, or locking the screen.

projects.title: Crypto Adoption Forecasting with AI
projects.name: Intermediate project combining economics and data science.
projects.desc: Explore the link between macroeconomic stressors (inflation, interest rates) and cryptocurrency adoption. Combine economic indicators with blockchain data to forecast trends and visualize connections.

projects.title: Speech-Based Alzheimer AI Screening Tool
projects.name: Advanced project in healthcare and Natural Language Processing.
projects.desc: Develop an accessible app that uses a fine-tuned BERT model to estimate Alzheimer's prediction scores from short speech samples. Based on published research from the project lead.

projects.title: ClubMate AI: Open-Source Assistant
projects.name: Intermediate project building agentic AI systems for student clubs.
projects.desc: Create a Discord bot to automate administrative tasks for student clubs. Using LangChain and the Model Context Protocol, it will integrate with tools like Google Calendar, Sheets, and Notion.
